description: Number of rooted trees with a forbidden limb of length 4.
comments: A rooted tree with a forbidden limb of length k is a rooted tree where the path from any leaf inward hits a branching node or the root within k steps.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
maple: with(numtheory):g:= proc(n) g(n):= `if`(n=0, 1, add(add(d*(g(d-1)-      `if`(d=4, 1, 0)), d=divisors(j))*g(n-j), j=1..n)/n)    end:a:= n-> g(n-1):seq(a(n), n=1..35);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 04 2014
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Dec 15 1999
